pull.title: Mandatory copyright agreement
pull.body: All contributions to the repository will agree to use the MIT license.

events.body: Maybe "unless specified otherwise in `contrib/debian/copyright` or at the top of the file itself". There are some exceptions, which may be acceptable. This is more meant as a default policy to avoid the flurry of #8784, #8702, #8701, #8700, #8676, from ever having to be done again.

events.message:
Mandatory copyright agreement

All contributions to the repository will agree to use the MIT license

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -198,3 +198,8 @@ Release Policy
 --------------
 
 The project leader is the release manager for each Bitcoin Core release.
+
+Copyright
+---------
+
+By contributing to this repository, you agree to license your work under the MIT license unless specified otherwise in `contrib/debian/copyright` or at the top of the file itself. Any code contributed where you are not the original author must contain its license header.
comments.body:
``` vim
:%s/code/work/g
```

We also host images.

Nit: Can you make this 80 chars wide?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -198,3 +198,8 @@ Release Policy

+

comments.body:
Also append to the last sentence maybe:

```
..., the original author(s) and source.
```
